annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m partnering with Luxardo to make a Tiki classic for you: the Jungle Bird, or to be more specific, the Jungle Bird Bianco....
annotations.title: Jungle Bird | How to Drink

annotations.description: According to the first published recipe of this drink in "The New American Bartender's Guide" by John J. Poister (1989) the Jungle Bird was created at the Av...
annotations.title: Tiki Cocktail: Jungle Bird

textContent:
1.5oz dark rum
1.5 pineapple juice
.75 campari
.5 lime
.5 Demerara syrup

On crushed ice in a rocks glass

https://youtu.be/D7hWQEXoPio

---

.25 oz or 15 ml Demerara Syrup
2 oz or 60 ml Pineapple Juice
.5 oz or 15 ml Lime Juice
.75 oz or 15 ml Luxardo Bitter Bianco or Campari
1.5 oz or 45 ml Pot Still Black Rum

Shake over Cracked Ice
Pour into rocks glass over ice
Garnish with cherry or Orchid

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FCNEIGZP1Ck
title: Jungle Bird
